function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerability of elderly people to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and mortality","Mitigation":"Provide targeted protection measures for elderly populations, such as vaccination campaigns and access to healthcare","Technologies":"Vaccines, telemedicine, and remote monitoring technologies","People":"Elderly population (65+ years old)","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Spatial clusters of infection cases","Impact":"Increased risk of localized outbreaks and difficulty in containment","Mitigation":"Implement targeted testing and tracing measures in high-risk spatial clusters","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, mobile tracking apps, and testing technologies","People":"General population in high-risk spatial clusters","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government"}]}
